body: Also use `bool` type in place of `uint8_t` which was the old bool type in toxcore before C99. --- This change is [](https://reviewable.io/reviews/toktok/c-toxcore/2103)

commit.message:
cleanup: Remove more implicit bool conversions.

Also use `bool` type in place of `uint8_t` which was the old bool type
in toxcore before C99.
